meanings.definition: To express (something) in a new or different way.

meanings.sent2: He rearticulated his argument to address the new information.
meanings.sent3: The teacher rearticulated the lesson with funny voices to keep the students engaged.

meanings.sent5: The artist rearticulated the landscape with vibrant colors, bringing it to life.
